materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a forested area in Buitenzorg (Bogor), Indonesia. The photograph shows thick vegetation, with a river cutting across the photograph in the middle. On the bottom left, there is a flight of stairs heading up a slope. There is a man on the stairs, wearing long sleeved top and white pants, with a hat. The edges of the photograph are curved. The title is written at the bottom-right, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java View in Buitenzorg, Java
